scenario.name: uac send dtmf in application/dtmf-relay
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=0 Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=1 Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=2 Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=3 Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=4 Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=5 Duration=100

Signal=6 Duration=100

Signal=7 Duration=100

Signal=8 Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=9 Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=* Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=# Duration=100

Signal=A Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=B Duration=100

Signal=C Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=D Duration=100

INFO [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INFO Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/dtmf-relay Content-Length: [len]
Signal=hookflash Duration=100

BYE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> [authentication] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
